congVote.dailyDigestSummary: Senate began consideration of the nomination of Neil M. Gorsuch, of Colorado, to be an Associate Justice of the Supreme Court of the United States.<P/>Prior to the consideration of this nomination, Senate took the following action:<P/>Senate agreed to the motion to proceed to Legislative Session.<P/>By 55 yeas to 44 nays (Vote No. 104), Senate agreed to the motion to proceed to executive session to consider the nomination.
